attributes.action: Allow the London Mayoral election to go ahead in 2020
attributes.additional_details:
The present Mayor should not be allowed to breach his term limits, irrespective of the present situation. 

Furthermore, his actions have been detrimental to the City of London during this period of crisis. 

The people of London should have their right to judge him democratically, restored to 2020. He must not be allowed to continue as London Mayor without being held to account within his term limits.
attributes.background: I want the London Mayoral election to be run as originally planned in 2020.
